EMAIL_CONTRIBUTION_RECEIVED_BODY: Congratulations, your transaction was successful!  Thank you for your participation and welcome to iCumulate!  We will notify you when your tokens will be released to you.  The iCumulate Team
EMAIL_DISCOUNT_BODY: Hello from iCumulate!  We are pleased to offer you a special one-time discount to participate in our token generating event!  Please claim your discount by clicking the link below.  Thank you from the iCumulate Team.
EMAIL_EMAIL_CONFIRMED_BODY:
SAVE THE DATE: PRESALE OPENS ON THE 2ND OF MAY 2018, AT 12AM EST

Exclusive early access:
Remember our Presale opens at 12am EST on the 2nd of May; however, as a special gift, you’ll be permitted to log in 2 hours earlier to participate – so save the date for 10am EST! Until then, you could also get busy with our:
